mapper.select: SELECT permissions FROM boot_sys_menu where del_flag = '0' GROUP BY permissions

SELECT boot_sys_menu.permissions FROM boot_sys_menu ,boot_sys_role ,boot_sys_role_menu ,boot_sys_user ,boot_sys_user_role ,mysql.help_topic WHERE boot_sys_menu.id = boot_sys_role_menu.menu_id AND boot_sys_role_menu.role_id = boot_sys_role.id AND boot_sys_user.id = boot_sys_user_role.user_id AND boot_sys_role.id = boot_sys_user_role.role_id AND boot_sys_user.id = #{userId} and boot_sys_menu.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY boot_sys_menu.permissions
